page.title: 10FARMERS WIFE
page.content: The farmers wife gets up at half past seven and makes a big breakfast for the farmer. Later she washes any dirty clothes. Then she feeds the hens and the calves.After that she goes inside and very often bakes some cakes. Mrs.Hutchinson enjoys baking and patchwork and is member of the local W.I. in Aislaby as well as being a member of a sequence dancing club. She loves being a farmers wife and has never wanted to be anything else. She has no neighbours close by but is always too busy in the house and around the farm to be lonely.
